additionalInfos.value:
is a [genre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Genre) in which the protagonist or protagonists end up in a series of challenges that typically include violence, extended fighting, physical feats, and frantic chases.

 ### [History](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Action_film#History)
 * [Early action films](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Action_film#Early_action_films)
 * [1970s](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Action_film#1970s)
 * [1980s](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Action_film#1980s)
 * [1990s](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Action_film#1990s)
 * [2000s](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Action_film#2000s)
 * [2010s](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Action_film#2010s)
